author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Bitcoin ATM Operator CoinFlip Explores Potential $1B Sale: Bloomberg
description: The company could become the latest crypto firm to sell as bitcoin’s rally fuels an acquisition boom.
content: CoinFlip, a Chicago-based operator of more than 5,500 cryptocurrency ATMs globally, is exploring a potential sale as merger and acquisition activity heats up across the digital asset sector, accordin… [+972 chars]
